store_info.name: Joystick: PC Paradise
store_info.description: Your one stop shop for top tier games at rock bottom prices!

products.name: Forza Horizon 5
products.description: Explore Mexico in stunning detail and race across diverse environments with hundreds of cars.

products.name: The Last of Us
products.description: Experience Joel and Ellie's harrowing journey through a post-apocalyptic world.

products.name: The Last of Us Part II
products.description: Ellie’s brutal and emotional quest for revenge in a world gone mad.

products.name: Grand Theft Auto V
products.description: Switch between three criminals and pull off daring heists in Los Santos.

products.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
products.description: Arthur Morgan’s story of loyalty, survival, and freedom in the dying days of the Wild West.

products.name: Elden Ring
products.description: FromSoftware’s vast open world of dark fantasy adventure filled with mystery and challenge.

products.name: Battlefield 6
products.description: Massive battles and destructible environments in the next evolution of the Battlefield series.

products.name: Cyberpunk 2077
products.description: Open-world story of survival and power in Night City.

products.name: Spider-Man Remastered
products.description: Swing through Marvel’s New York as Spider-Man in this high-flying remaster.

products.name: NBA 2K26
products.description: The latest in the NBA 2K franchise featuring new career and franchise modes.

products.name: Madden NFL 26
products.description: Lead your favorite NFL team to victory with updated rosters and enhanced AI.

products.name: EA Sports FC 26
products.description: Build your dream club and compete at the top level in EA’s re-imagined football experience.

products.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7
products.description: The next generation of tactical FPS warfare in the acclaimed Black Ops series.

products.name: Need for Speed Unbound
products.description: Rule the streets in high-stakes races with deep customization and street art style.

products.name: The Crew Motorfest
products.description: Drive and explore the Hawaiian island of Oʻahu in a massive car festival experience.
